偨字的基本解释

偨
cī
〔偨傂〕参差不齐。亦作“偨池”。

偨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cī］
［《集韻》叉宜切，平支，初。］
见“偨池”。

偨字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　偨； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页111第19
【集韻】叉宜切，音差。偨傂，不齊也。【揚雄·甘泉賦】騈羅列布，鱗以雜沓兮。偨傂參差，魚頡而鳥䀪。　又【司馬相如·上林賦】偨池茈虒。【註】茈音此，虒音思。亦作偨傂。

偨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
偨字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
cī
〔偨傂〕Uneven. Also known as "偨池".
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cī］
["Jiyun" fork should be cut, flat branch, early. ]
See "偨池".
Sorrow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　偨; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 111 Page 19
[Jiyun] The fork should be cut, and the pitch is poor. Huo Nuo, not even. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】The cloths are laid out, and the scales are mixed. The beauty is mixed, and the birds are different from each other.　[Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu] 偨池茈茈。 [Note] This is the sound of Feng Yin. Also known as Nuo.
